document.full_text: by all means, go after young breakout players, but don't overlook tried-and-true veterans who usually can be counted on for stable production, regardless of how overpaid they may be in real life.
document.title: fantasy focus: old and boring bargain hitters
lines_and_colors: by all means, go after young breakout players, but don't overlook tried-and-true veterans who usually can be counted on for stable production, regardless of how overpaid they may be in real life.
